setFullParticleNameDisplay(boolean) - Method in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.UserPreferences
Sets the field that determines whether the particle names should be written out in full on the graph's nodes.

showStatusMessage(String, Color) - Method in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.Controller
Starts a new ShowStatusMessageWorker with the given parameters to display a message in the MainFrame's status bar for a certain time.
ShowStatusMessageWorker - Class in de.gnwi.spicesviewer
A SwingWorker extending class to present a status message in the MainFrame's status bar for a defined amount of time.
ShowStatusMessageWorker(JLabel, String, Color) - Constructor for class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.ShowStatusMessageWorker
Constructor: Tests the parameters and assigns them to the object's fields.
SPLIT_PANE_RESIZE_WEIGHT - Static variable in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.Constants
The resize weight for the applications split panes.
StructureLibraryPanel - Class in de.gnwi.spicesviewer
A JPanel to present the user some exemplary SPICES structures (loaded from a 'Structure.properties' file) that can be displayed in the ViewerPanel.
StructureLibraryPanel() - Constructor for class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.StructureLibraryPanel
Constructor: It initialises the new StructureLibraryPanel's components, layouts them and gives them tool tips.
StructurePropertiesReader - Class in de.gnwi.spicesviewer
An abstract library to read a 'Structures.properties' file containing some exemplary SPICES structures and to load them into the Spices Viewer application.
StructurePropertiesReader() - Constructor for class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.StructurePropertiesReader
